name: Thuy Ka
about: Worked in Non-IT recruitment field for the last several years.

experiences.description:
- Be responsible for the full-cycle of recruitment activity at the Company. 
- Lead, guide and support other member of TA team. 
- Develop innovative and resourceful methods of sourcing and attracting top talents. 
- Partner with multiple hiring managers to develop a deep understanding of the business and hiring needs in order to effectively drive recruitment efforts. 
- Maintain all existing recruitment channels and run analytics to measure its effectiveness. 
- Maintain and build relationships with candidates to develop a strong talent pipeline for the business. 
- Plan and executive engagement activities and events to enhance employee engagement. 
- Provide Orientation, office-tours for new employees. 
- Work directly with Universities for job fairs, career events, and internship programs. 
- Manage external and internal communications channels. 
- Coordinate with hiring managers and new hires to do check-ins and follow up the probationers/interns till ending their probation/internship. 
- Adjust, develop recruitment process, recruitment policies, and related documents. 
- Support Head of HR, COO in translating documents, emails, policies.

Search & Client Management
- Be responsible for delivering high quality service to clients and candidates.
- Work with client, find out about their business, their current and future recruitment needs, and to develop a loyal and powerful relationship with them.
- Attract candidates by well preparing job description, job posting, screening and short-listing applicants; as well as by networking, headhunting and through referrals.
- Screen and interview candidates in accordance with company standards.
- Organize interviews for candidate as requested by the client.
- Ensure the recruitment speed and results of the assigned vacancies are efficient with regards to turn around time and candidate’s quality.
- Provide advice to both clients and candidates on salary, training and career progression.
- Review recruitment policies to ensure effectiveness of selection techniques and recruitment Programs.
Business Development
- Actively market Executive Search capabilities to clients and candidates.
- Assist with division / company business development needs.
- Collect/relay market information to superior maximizing business opportunities.
- Cooperate with other Managers/Consultants to meet corporate target.

- Best employee Q2 / 2018
